page.title: 04 Housing in Nuthall
page.content: In Nuthall there are mostly{detached houses. Many people live in}bungalows or{semi_detached}homes.A few live in {terraced houses or flats.}We found out about some of the homes:- My house is{detached.}It has three windows at the front. They are case- ment windows and are double glazed. The bricks are joined with quetta bonding. The door is arched and mostly made of glass. The wood part is painted white. There are also pipes and guttering on the front of the house. My house is{semi-detached.}It has a bay-window and 4 casement windows. Some of the glass is stained glass with pictures in it, some is frosted glass that you can't see through. The door is wooden. It has a brass letter box and handle.The bricks on the house are joined with stretcher bonding.
